items.title: Data File
items.description: Excel file in XLS or XLSX format supported by [readxl](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/readxl).

items.title: Missing Values
items.description: A comma separated list of double-quoted strings to be considered as missing. Example: "NONE","INFINITY","999". By default, readxl treats blank cells as missing data.

items.title: Skip
items.description: Minimum number of rows to skip before reading anything, be it column names or data. Leading empty rows are automatically skipped, so this is a lower bound.

items.title: Identifier Column Name
items.description: Name of the column containing the IDs

items.title: Entity Type
items.description: Specify what these data relate to (Participant, Instrument, Area etc.)
